column1: Croatia progressed to the World Cup round of 16 after playing out a scoreless draw with Belgium in their Group F match. Romelu Lukaku had four chances to save the Red Devils from an early exit
column2: but he was unable to convert any of them
column3: hitting the post and missing from close range. Croatia's defense was able to keep the Belgians at bay
column4: allowing them to advance in second place in the group
column5: while Morocco took the top spot after their victory over Canada.
